mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_ID AS chatId , CHAT_SPCE_ID AS chatSpceId , BBS_ID AS bbsId , SEND_ID AS sendId , RCV_ID AS rcvId , CHAT_CN AS chatCn , SEND_DT AS sendDt , ATCH_FILE_NO AS atchFileNo , IDNTY_YN AS idntyYn FROM TB_CHAT WHERE CHAT_SPCE_ID = #{chatSpceId}

SELECT A.CHAT_ID AS chatId , A.CHAT_SPCE_ID AS chatSpceId , A.BBS_ID AS bbsId , A.CHAT_CN AS chatCn , A.SEND_DT AS sendDt , CASE WHEN A.SEND_ID = #{mbrId} THEN A.RCV_ID WHEN A.RCV_ID = #{mbrId} THEN A.SEND_ID END AS chatPartner , CASE WHEN A.RCV_ID = #{mbrId} AND A.IDNTY_YN = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS chkYn FROM TB_CHAT A WHERE (A.SEND_ID = #{mbrId} OR A.RCV_ID = #{mbrId}) AND A.CHAT_ID IN ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(B.CHAT_ID), 0) FROM TB_CHAT B GROUP BY B.CHAT_SPCE_ID ) ORDER BY A.SEND_DT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CHAT SET IDNTY_YN = 0 WHERE CHAT_SPCE_ID = #{chatSpceId} AND RCV_ID = #{mbrId} AND IDNTY_YN = 1
